meanings.definition: A room or compartment with a toilet and washbasin; a bathroom.
meanings.sent1: The lavatory in the house is always kept clean.
meanings.sent2: I need to use the lavatory before we leave.
meanings.sent3: The lavatory door squeaks loudly when opened.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a lavatory of creative ideas waiting to be flushed out.
meanings.sent5: The lavatory smelled of fresh soap and cleanliness.

meanings.sent1: The lavatory at the park was out of order.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to flush the lavatory after use.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the lavatory was a great place to hide its toys.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a clogged lavatory, full of unnecessary waste.
meanings.sent5: The lavatory in the airplane was surprisingly spacious.
